remarks: The ring unit in a semiring left module belongs to the ring base set. (Contributed by NM, 11-Jan-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Jun-2014.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Apr-2018.)
statement:
slmd1cl.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
slmd1cl.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
slmd1cl.u $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` F ) $.
slmd1cl $p |- ( W e. SLMod -> .1. e. K ) $.
